website_summaries.verdict: Consumers who are into the style of the 80s can satisfy their needs for a throwback sneaker through the Reebok Workout Mid. This athletic-shoe inspired footwear keeps the foot supported by the traditional H-strap feature found on the sides. The classic sneaker with adequate features comes at a budget friendly price. Although it has components that bring comfort, its width might cause problems for people with wide feet. It also doesn’t have enough support for individuals with a flat foot.
pros: The Reebok Workout Mid is budget friendly
A reviewer liked the stability provided by these kicks
The stability comes from its mid-top style
A handful of reviewers liked the style of the shoe
It lets the wearer tap the old school, 80s look
A few commented that these shoes are comfortable
Some Reebok Workout Mid owners said that the shoe fits great
The padded collar gives comfort to the user
cons: The Reebok Workout Mid is narrow according to a few testers
One said that it’s not recommended to people with wide feet
A reviewer with flat foot said that he had to purchase shoe pads to make the shoe comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Men's Workout Mid R12 Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe. I manage a ball team and the color's match the team colors but the shoe was picked first because of the fit that this style of Reebok shoe gives. This is not my first pair of Reebok shoes in this shoe style so I knew what to expect. Great fitting shoe and helps to support the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. O

customer_reviews.title: runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size and it's narrow. I brought these for comfort. I thought they would break in after a couple wears. It's been two months and they still didn't break in. I would suggest ordering 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ta Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, a bit too pricy, got this for my wife's oil brother, he liked it alot
customer_reviews.author: lennon

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping! Great shoes! Fits as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes want to get some more for my husband he wears it everyday! It became his favorite shoes! I want to purchase different colors as well!
customer_reviews.author: MADEBYMC

customer_reviews.title: everyone loves them
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are perfect everyone keep asking were i got them from and how good they look . i plan to buy all three pairs of this shoe style thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Curtis I.

customer_reviews.title: good shoe for the money nice and the material is good it fit just right it is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and clean its a good shoe for the money ,fit just right it is also comfortable and made from good material
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: lovely pair
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as it appeared online. No deception. I love d idea of choice of lace---a different colour lacentre will give new sneakers! They r for my younger brother and I know he ll love them
customer_reviews.author: Ofomah Nkoli

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband he was upset over it I never contacted the seller just left it as is he had already took the soles out and it's still too small
customer_reviews.author: Jose T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this vendor!
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes on the expected arrival date. I love how quick and easy this entire process was. Looking for more shoes to buy for my family for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: K Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes please put some bigger sizes up like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes please put some bigger sizes up like 10.5 and i promise i will buy a pair or two mabye even three
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

product_meta.title: Reebok Workout Mid R12 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Reebok Men's The Workout Mid Ice Sneaker. The Reebok Workout Mid Ice Sneaker in White, Reebok Royal, & Ice This iconic Reebok silhouette features a mid-cut design with soft leather upper. The workout has an icy blue sole perfect for those who'd like to ease into the all white street ghost trend. Mid top sneaker Leather upper Tonal stitching and laces Signature Reebok logo on the side panel Translucent blue outsole Punched eyelets, and metal contrast eyelets Metal lace lock Contrast logo tag on the tongue Contrast embroidered logo on the heel Padded ankle Imported By Reebok.
